DataElement.preferredName: Follow-up Report Post Transplantation Timepoint Year Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done._A short textual account; having provided a short account._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._The grafting of tissues from one individual to another or place to place within a single individual._A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event._The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period._To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done._A short textual account; having provided a short account._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species._A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.
A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.
